successes.title: Fred Water Flask = More Water, Less Sugar
successes.description: The water bottle that fits comfortably in your pocket, so you can carry more water with you more often.

Pledges.description: THANK YOU - Show your support for Fred and get a digital thank you and high-five from the Fred Team.
FRED STICKERS - Receive our thanks and represent the Fred Flask with a pack of six Fred Water stickers.

SUPER EARLY BIRD SPECIAL FRED WATER FLASK (BRUSHED STEEL) - Get your limited edition Kickstarter box which includes 1 Brushed Stainless Steel Water Flask, 1 Extra Steel Cap, 1 Loop Lanyard, and 2 Foil Stamp Fred Stickers. 
 
EST. SAVINGS OF $22 OFF RETAIL VALUE.

SUPER EARLY BIRD SPECIAL FRED WATER FLASK (POWDER COAT COLOR) - Get your limited edition Kickstarter box which includes 1 Colored Stainless Steel Water Flask (Choose from Charcoal, White, Army Green, Lifeguard Orange, Baby Blue) 1 Extra Steel Cap, 1 Loop Lanyard, and 2 Foil Stamp Fred Stickers. 
 
EST. SAVINGS OF $22 OFF RETAIL VALUE.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL FRED WATER FLASK (BRUSHED STEEL) - Get your limited edition Kickstarter box which includes 1 Brushed Stainless Steel Water Flask, 1 Extra Steel Cap, 1 Loop Lanyard, and 2 Foil Stamp Fred Stickers.
EST. SAVINGS OF $17 OFF RETAIL VALUE.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL FRED WATER FLASK (POWDER COAT COLOR) - Get your limited edition Kickstarter box which includes 1 Powder Coat Color Stainless Steel Water Flask (Choose from White, Charcoal, Army Green, Orange, Light Blue), 1 Extra Steel Cap, 1 Loop Lanyard, and 2 Foil Stamp Fred Stickers.
EST. SAVINGS OF $17 OFF RETAIL VALUE.

FRED WATER FLASK (BRUSHED STEEL or POWDER COAT COLOR) - Get a limited edition Kickstarter box which includes 1 Brushed Stainless OR Powder Coat Color Stainless Steel Water Flask, 1 Extra Steel Cap, 1 Loop Lanyard, and 2 Foil Stamp Fred Stickers.
EST. SAVINGS OF $16 OFF RETAIL VALUE.

FRED WATER FLASK (BRUSHED STEEL or POWDER COAT COLOR) - Get a limited edition Kickstarter box which includes 1 Brushed Stainless OR Powder Coat Color Stainless Steel Water Flask, 1 Extra Steel Cap, 1 Loop Lanyard, and 2 Foil Stamp Fred Stickers.
EST. SAVINGS OF $16 OFF RETAIL VALUE.

2 FRED WATER FLASKS (MIX AND MATCH BRUSHED STEEL or COLOR) - Get 2 limited edition Kickstarter boxes which each include 1 Brushed Stainless OR Colored Stainless Steel Water Flask, 1 Extra Steel Cap, 1 Loop Lanyard, and 2 Foil Stamp Fred Stickers.
EST. SAVINGS OF $34 OFF RETAIL VALUE.

SPECIAL GIFTING SERVICE: 3 FRED WATER FLASKS - EACH MAILED TO A SEPARATE ADDRESS FOR YOU - Each of the 3 is a Kickstarter Limited Edition Box Set which includes 1 Brushed Stainless OR Powder Coat Color Water Flask, 1 Extra Steel Cap, 1 Loop Lanyard, and 2 Foil Stamp Fred Stickers.
EST. SAVINGS OF $49 OFF RETAIL VALUE.
The Idea: Rather than shipping all of them to you and then having you turn around and ship them back out, we skip a step for you. No profit for us on shipping.

4 FRED WATER FLASKS (MIX AND MATCH BRUSHED STEEL or COLOR) - Each of the 4 is a Kickstarter Limited Edition Box Set which includes 1 Brushed Stainless OR Powder Coat Color Stainless Steel Water Flask, 1 Extra Steel Cap, 1 Loop Lanyard, and 2 Foil Stamp Fred Stickers.
